description: During construction, and any subsequent filling, refilling or replenishment of the <<lake/reservoir/pond>> created by the impounding works, the Licence Holder shall not allow the water level in the lake to rise when the flow in the <<water body name>> as gauged by the Agency at its gauging station at <<GS name and NGR>> is equal to or less than <<flow rate>>. The Agencyâ€™s said gauging flow shall be conclusive
